sentences.cn: 英国的伤亡人数始终很低。

sentences.en: Charles was brave and remarkably good-humoured.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯很勇敢而且脾气也特别好。

sentences.en: Except for the remarkably tidy kitchen, the place was a mess.
sentences.cn: 除了厨房特别干净外，这地方一片狼藉。

sentences.en: He made a remarkably swift recovery.
He was remarkably successful in business.
sentences.cn: 他在事业上取得了显著成功.

sentences.en: I thought she was remarkably restrained in the circumstances.
sentences.cn: 我认为她在那种情况下非常克制.

sentences.en: Inflation has decelerated remarkably over the past two years.
sentences.cn: 过去的两年里通货膨胀已经明显放缓。

sentences.en: Leaving aside the question of privacy, constant surveillance can be remarkably convenient.
sentences.cn: 如果不去管隐私问题的话，实施不间断监视其实是非常便利的。

sentences.en: Remarkably, all of the passengers survived the crash.
sentences.cn: 令人称奇的是，这次事故中所有乘客都幸免于难。

sentences.en: She spoke in a quiet voice but used remarkably coarse expressions.
sentences.cn: 她说话声音很小，但是用了些特别粗俗的字眼儿。

sentences.en: The book is remarkably accurate and transparently fair-minded.
sentences.cn: 这本书记述确凿，言辞明晰，见解公正。

sentences.en: The book, so far as I can judge, is remarkably accurate.
sentences.cn: 就我看来，这本书内容相当准确。

sentences.en: The former hostage is in remarkably good shape considering his ordeal.
sentences.cn: 想想人质曾遭受的折磨，获救后其身体状况已经是出奇地好了。

sentences.en: The man had a huge head of remarkably black, unruly hair.
sentences.cn: 那个人有一头乱蓬蓬的黑发。

sentences.en: The troops have been remarkably well-behaved so far.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止，这支军队作风端正。

sentences.en: The witness was remarkably collected under cross - examination.
sentences.cn: 在连番询问之下,证人仍然镇定自若.

words.tran_cn: 卓越的；非凡的；值得注意的
显著地；非常地；引人注目地

trans.tran_cn: 引人注目地，明显地，非常地，格外；出乎意料地
